title: Ep. 92 - Transcendental Meditation
description:
The boys really went for it today. They talked about old cartoons, crazy things they did in high school, what it takes to make it to the top of your field, crooked money managers, yard animals, Eddie Murphy's return to standup, SNL vs In Living Color, Todd told an old bank robbery story, they played Fact or Fiction and ended things with a tribute to Robin Williams.

Episode Sponsors and Discounts:
